about_the_game:
Venture into a world where the primal past collides with relics from the future!

In GRUG TO FUTURE, you play as a rugged caveman on a quest to uncover mysterious artifacts from a time yet to come. But beware, with every discovery comes a hoard of jealous cavemen and ravenous dinosaurs eager to claim the relic's power for themselves.

Key Features:

Unique Fusion Gameplay: Combining the thrill of a top-down shooter with the strategic depth of tower defense. Will you engage in combat or fortify your defenses? The choice is yours!

Relic Hunting: Scour diverse landscapes for futuristic artifacts. But guard them well – every find triggers waves of relentless enemies determined to tear you down.

Build & Defend: Construct walls, place turrets, and recruit caveman allies to defend your precious relics. Upgrade and evolve your defenses with perks drawn from unearthed tech.

Dynamic Choices: Every relic grants a choice of three random upgrades. With every playthrough, craft a new strategy and build from the plethora of futuristic powers at your fingertips.

Primal Challenges: Face an array of enemies, from cunning Stone Brawler Cavemen to the terrifying T-Rex Juggernaut. Adapt and survive against the evolving threats.

In a time before time, the future casts its shadow. Can you harness its power and withstand the onslaught? Delve into Caveman Chronicles and craft your legend in stone and steel.

Embark on this unpredictable journey and become the ultimate guardian of tomorrow's legacy!
